boardgame.name: Giant Killer Robots: Heavy Hitters
GKR: Heavy Hitters
boardgame.description: Welcome to the biggest sport of the future _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; GIANT KILLER ROBOTS : HEAVY HITTERS!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;GKR: HEAVY HITTERS is an advertising-driven, televised combat sport where mega corporations fight for lucrative salvage rights and advertising dominance in Earth_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s abandoned cities. But more importantly, they need you! Your skills as a pilot and tactician are needed to win, gaining your Faction more fans, and more importantly, loyal consumers._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You will be piloting a Heavy Hitter, the name given to the largest fighting mechs in the battle zone. Flanking your Heavy Hitter in these high stakes sport matches are 3 unmanned robotic support units, consisting of Combat, Repair and Recon. Fighting head-to-head using your Heavy Hitter, you control your entire team of GKRs, strategizing your way to victory. Any dumb mech-jockey can shoot, but can you STRAT? Guess we_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;re gonna find out!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;GKR: Heavy Hitters - A new boardgame set in the world of Giant killer Robots!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The solo rules are included in the updated rulebook which comes with the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: This is to buy out my kickstarter pledge. I will change the shipping address to yours and you will receive the kickstarter core box (with all stretch goals, but no add-ons). WETA is estimating shipping cost at $35. If it turns out to be less, you will pay actual. If it turns out to be more, we will split the difference.

This game is new and sealed from Kickstarter. It includes: GKR: Heavy Hitters Core Game GKR: Heavy Hitters Stretch Goals w/ Kickstarter Exclusives Big Little Buddy (Add-On) Urban Wasteland Expansion (Add-On) Themed Defense Dice (Add-On) Due to some unfortunate life events, I am forced to sell my board game collection. For several years I was paid to demo games and afterward, had the option of purchasing the game I demo’d. Because of this, most of my games are either new or have been played once. I have a large number of games for sale, some quite small, so please check my inventory to see if you’d like to purchase multiple items. I will work with you a bit on price if you do, and of course, it will save on shipping. I am an eBay top-rates seller with over 4200 positive feedback. I ship promptly and pack the items well. You will not receive beat-up games with pieces thrown all over inside the box. After purchase, buyer will be responsible for exact shipping charges. I accept PayPal only unless prearranged ahead of time.
Everything from the Pilot_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Edition Pledge: - GKR: Heavy Hitters Core Box board game - KS exclusive Pilot Miniatures - All Applicable Stretch Goals

New in shrink GKR heavy Hitters Core Edition with Kickstarter Stretch Goals Will ship in original padded container. Shipping is additional and charge will be based on actuals by your preferred method and carrier.

Kickstarter Pilot_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Edition with all stretch goals and exclusive Pilot miniatures. $20CAD shipping to anywhere in Canada or the continental U.S. If looking for international shipping (outside Canada and the U.S.) please message.
Kickstarter Pilots Edition (includes stretch goals and pilot minis)

New and unopened Kickstarter Core box and Stretch goals box. Will be shipped in the original box and packaging as pledge was received. All packaging in excellent condition. ***US Customers Only...PayPal Payments Only... NO PO Boxes*** Box is large and fairly heavy...shipping costs will probably be in the $14-$18 range. Game will ship within 48 hours after payment is received.

This is for the GKR: Heavy Hitters Core Box _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Kickstarter exclusives INCLUDES: GKR: Heavy Hitters Core Box board game (opened - not played) All Applicable Stretch Goals from the campaign (unopened) Core box has been opened, looked at and packed away. Stretch goal box with Kickstarter exclusives has not been opened. For shipping, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m happy to send via Media mail which would likely be around $6. Please estimate shipping via USPS Priority or Media Mail from Zip 94595. Will also mail internationally, but that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll be pricey!

PILOT_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;S EDITION You will receive the Core game which includes: 4 Fully painted heavy hitter miniatures 12 Support unit miniatures 4 Faction decks made up of 152 cards (38 per faction) 80 Faction Holo-Board tags (20 per faction) 4 Energy tracker tokens 4 dashboards 10 buildings which come unassembled with demolition base and tagging cap. 1 Game Board 2 Attack dice 8 Defense dice (Custom add on is included too which was extra) 16 Pilot Cards and Tokens (4 per faction) 12 Upgrade tokens (3 per faction) 4 Reference Tokens (1 per faction) 1 Achievement board 25 Sponsor cards 1 Glory hound token. PLUS ALL UNLOCKED STRETCH GOALS ARE INCLUDED! You also get what is included in the Pilot_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Edition: This allows you to swap out your pilot tokens with 4 custom miniatures. Also 4 new exclusive pilot minis were also unlocked and included in the Pilot_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Edition!

This is the base version of the game (not Pilot_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s or Painter_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s editions) with the add ons listed below. Brand new, base game still in shrink and ready to ship via FedEx from 45409. Kickstarter box opened to confirm all add ons and exclusives included (they are all accounted for, some shipments have been missing pieces). Hallo, Ich biete hier das Brettspiel „GKR Heavy Hitters“ inkl. den Addons und aller Stretch Goals zum Verkauf an. Das Spiel ist in sehr gutem Zustand und wurde noch 2x bespielt, die Gebäude der Urban Wasteland Erweiterung wurden beklebt. Privatverkauf ohne Rücknahme und Garantie. Zahlung bei Versand via PayPal zzgl. Versandkoszen. Abholung und Barzahlung in Bonn ————————————————————— I‘m offering the boardgame „gkr heavy hitter“ with all exclusive Kickstarter Addons (Big Little Buddy, Wasteland, Additional Dice, Waterslides) and Stretch Goals (Mercs, Single Player, etc.). The game was played twice, but is in like new condition. The buildings of the wasteland addon are pasted with stickers. Sending possible at your costs. Happy to hear from you and your questions!

Kickstarter Exclusive Pilot Mini_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s. Contains all 8 Pilot Mini_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s and the 4 colored bases. This add-on was kickstarter exclusive. This does not include the main game but allows you to upgrade your main game with the exclusive content.
Pilot_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s pledge level with stretch goals and pilot miniatures. Opened but never played. Shipping to Continental U.S. is $28 (it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s two huge boxes).

Kickstarter Pliot_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Edition with allstretch goals and add-ons. Includes: Core Box SG Box Urban Wasteland Big Little Buddy Dice Can Local pick up is available in Lexington or Louisville. I will be attending orgins and Gencon as well.

COMES WITH: - x2 Giant high-quality Heavy Hitters miniatures up to 139mm tall - x6 Highly detailed Support Units standing up to 47mm tall (pre-shaded) - x6 Support Unit Cards (Combat, Repair, Recon) - x140 Faction Cards (70 per factions) with unique artwork - x40 Holo-board Tags (20 per faction) - x16 Polot tracking tokens (8 per faction)

Only played 2 times- our gaming group loved it but games tended to take too long with 4 players for it to be a regular game we would play. Shipping is kinda high given the size/weight of the box so keep that in mind. This is the standard edition, retails for $149. Thanks!
